pages.privacy-policy: TastyLayers Privacy Policy - Your Data, Our Commitment +91-124-6201519 tastylayers@gmail.com TastyLayers Home Custom Creations Enjoy About Us Sweet revolution Why are we Privacy Policy Before you embark on this sweet journey with us, we would like to provide you with some important information about our products and services. This Disclaimer page is designed to ensure that we maintain transparency and honesty with our valued customers. First and foremost, all our cakes and tortes are made with love, care, and high-quality ingredients. We source our ingredients from trusted suppliers and ensure that they meet our stringent quality and safety standards. However, please note that our products may contain allergens such as nuts, dairy, eggs, soy, and gluten. We cannot guarantee that our products are completely allergen-free as they are prepared in a kitchen where these allergens are present. While we make every effort to ensure that our cakes and tortes are delivered in perfect condition, we cannot be held responsible for any damage that may occur during transit. We recommend that you or someone else be present at the delivery address to receive the order. If you are not satisfied with the condition of the product upon delivery, please contact us immediately at tastylayers@gmail.com. We take great pride in the appearance of our cakes and tortes, and we strive to ensure that they look as close to the pictures on our website as possible. However, please note that our products are handmade and may vary slightly in appearance. Moreover, factors such as lighting, screen resolution, and color calibration may affect the way our products appear on your device. We offer a wide range of customization options for our cakes and tortes, and we are happy to accommodate any special requests you may have. However, please note that any changes to the design, flavor, or size of the product may affect the price and delivery time. We recommend that you place your order at least 48 hours in advance to ensure that we have enough time to prepare and deliver your order. We understand that sometimes, plans change, and you may need to cancel or reschedule your order. We require a minimum of 24 hours' notice for any cancellations or rescheduling requests. If you cancel your order less than 24 hours in advance, we reserve the right to charge a cancellation fee of 50% of the total order value. If you fail to receive your order at the scheduled time and date, we cannot be held responsible for any additional charges or fees incurred. At TastyLayers, we are passionate about creating cakes and tortes that not only taste amazing but also look stunning. We believe that a beautiful cake can be the centerpiece of any celebration, and we take great pride in our ability to create customized designs that reflect our customers' unique styles and personalities. Our team of skilled bakers and decorators has years of experience in the industry and is constantly striving to improve their craft. We use only the finest ingredients and techniques to ensure that our cakes and tortes are of the highest quality. From classic flavors like chocolate and vanilla to more exotic options like lavender and matcha, we have a wide range of options to suit every taste. We understand that every celebration is unique, and we are committed to providing our customers with a personalized experience. Whether you are planning a wedding, birthday party, or corporate event, we will work with you to create a customized cake or torte that meets your specific needs and budget. We offer a variety of sizes and shapes, from traditional round and square cakes to more unique options like hexagonal and petal-shaped tortes. In addition to our customized designs, we also offer a selection of pre-designed cakes and tortes that are perfect for any occasion. Our collection includes a range of styles, from elegant and sophisticated to whimsical and playful. We are constantly updating our collection to reflect the latest trends and styles, so be sure to check back often. At TastyLayers, we are committed to sustainability and ethical practices. We strive to minimize our environmental impact by using eco-friendly packaging and reducing food waste. We also source our ingredients from suppliers who share our commitment to ethical and sustainable practices. We are proud to be a part of the vibrant and diverse community of cake and torte enthusiasts. We believe that our passion for baking and decorating brings people together and creates lasting memories. We are grateful for the support and loyalty of our customers and are committed to providing them with the best possible experience. To order a cake or torte from TastyLayers, simply follow these steps: Browse our collection of cakes and tortes and select the one that you would like to order. Choose the size and flavor of the cake or torte that you would like. If you would like to customize the design of the cake or torte, please provide us with your specifications in the "Special Instructions" section of the order form. Enter your delivery address and choose a delivery date and time that is convenient for you. Review your order and make any necessary changes. Proceed to checkout and enter your payment information. We are committed to providing you with the best possible experience and ensuring that you are completely satisfied with our products and services. If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback, please do not hesitate to contact us at tastylayers@gmail.com. We value your input and will do our best to address your concerns. Thank you for choosing TastyLayers as your go-to destination for delicious and beautiful cakes and tortes. We are honored to be a part of your special occasions and celebrations, and we look forward to serving you for years to come.
